mapper.select: SELECT s.sname, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.bnum, s.fcategory_mikey, s.sstatus_mikey, s.stel, s.saddr, s.simg1, m.mname FROM shop s JOIN member m ON s.mnum = m.mnum WHERE bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET sstatus_mikey = #{sstatus_mikey} WHERE bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (bnum, fcategory_makey, fcategory_mikey, saddr, stel, sname, start_time, end_time, sstatus_makey, sstatus_mikey, mnum, bid, bstaus_makey, bstaus_mikey, simg1, simg2, simg3, sconfirm) VALUES ( #{bnum}, #{fcategory_makey}, #{fcategory_mikey}, #{saddr}, #{stel}, #{sname}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{sstatus_makey}, #{sstatus_mikey}, #{mnum}, #{bid}, #{bstaus_makey}, #{bstaus_mikey}, #{simg1}, #{simg2}, #{simg3}, #{sconfirm} );
